panels.description: Whether the cell has failed to pass its healthcheck against the garden backend.
panels.title: Unhealthy Cells

panels.description: Whether the cf-app domain is up-to-date, so that CF apps from CC have been synchronized with DesiredLRPs for Diego to run.
panels.title: CF Apps Synchronized

panels.description: Whether the cf-tasks domain is up-to-date, so that CF tasks from CC have been synchronized with tasks for Diego to run.
panels.title: CF Tasks Synchronized

panels.description: Number of routes registered.
panels.title: Routes

panels.description: Number of failed user authentication attempts since the last startup.
panels.title: Failed User Authentications

panels.description: Available MiB of memory to allocate to containers.
panels.title: Available Memory

panels.description: Available MiB of disk to allocate to containers.
panels.title: Available Disk

panels.description: Available number of containers.
panels.title: Available Containers

panels.description: Max number of requests per second received by the BBS.
panels.title: BBS Requests per Second (max)

panels.description: Max time in nanoseconds that the BBS took to handle requests to its API endpoints.
panels.title: BBS Request Latency (max)

panels.description: Max time in nanoseconds that the BBS took to run its LRP and Task convergence pass. Emitted when LRP and Task convergence runs.
panels.title: BBS Convergence Duration (max)

panels.description: Max number of requests per second received by the Gorouter.
panels.title: Router Requests per Second (max)

panels.description: Max time in nanoseconds that the Gorouter took to handle requests to its application endpoints.
panels.title: Router Latency (max)

panels.description: Max number of Gorouter's HTTP Bad Gateway responses per second.
panels.title: Router Bad Gateway Responses per Second (max)

panels.description: Max number of requests per second received by the Cloud Controller.
panels.title: CC Requests Completed per Second (max)

panels.description: Max number of background jobs in the queues that have yet to run for the first time.
panels.title: CC Job Queue Length (max)

panels.description: Max number of CC's HTTP 5xx responses per second.
panels.title: CC 5xx Responses per Second (max)

panels.description: Max number of LRP instances and Tasks that the auctioneer successfully placed on Diego cells per second
panels.title: Auctions per Second (max)

panels.description: Cumulative number of LRP instances and Tasks that the auctioneer successfully of failed to place on Diego cells.
panels.title: Auctions

panels.description: Max time in nanoseconds that the auctioneer took to fetch state from all the cells when running its auction.
panels.title: Fetch States Duration (max)

panels.description: Max time in nanoseconds that the nsync-bulker took to synchronize CF apps and Diego DesiredLRPs
panels.title: Desired LRP Sync Duration (max)

panels.description: Number of failed staging tasks.
panels.title: Failed Staging Requests

panels.description: Max number of messages received & dropped across all of Doppler listeners per second.
panels.title: Messages per Second Received/Dropped by Doppler Listeners  (max)

panels.description: Max number of messages marshalled sent and messages unmarshalled received per second.
panels.title: Metron Agent Envelopes per Second (max)

panels.description: Max number of sent messages  per second to Doppler
panels.title: Metron Agent Messages Sent per Second (max)
